projects.name: PRIVATE-GPT WITH CUSTOM DATA DOCUMENTS
projects.description: Developed a secure, locally-deployed PDF chatbot using LaMini-T5, FAISS and LangChain. Implemented a Streamlit interface for user-friendly interactions and enhanced security

projects.name: FACIAL EMOTION RECOGNITION PLAYER
projects.description: Enhanced user experience by tailoring music to real-time emotional states. Integrated dynamic song playback based on users facial emotions.

projects.name: KEYLOGGER MALWARE
projects.description: Configured automated email delivery of captured data to an attacker. Developed a Python script for logging user keystrokes on websites.

projects.name: ROV FOR INSPECTION OF HRTS IN HYDROPOWER PLANT
projects.description: Innovated ROV equipped with advanced sensors and AI vision for precise HRT inspections. Engineered for high-pressure underwater environments hydropower plants with versatile robotic arm

projects.name: LAPTOP PRICE PREDICTION
projects.description: Created a machine learning model to accurately predict laptop prices based on user specifications. Applied advanced data analysis techniques to enhance model accuracy and performance.
